name: 多變量統計分析
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENC2053  量化方法與Ｒ語言實作】 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: Gain the fundamental concepts in multivariate statistics
Demonstrate the ability to analyze data with R
syllabus:
This is an advanced statistics course for graduate students in social sciences. Students are required to complete a fundamental statistics course and a relevant programming course prior to enrolling this course. We will cover the dimension reduction techniques, regression, classification, and resampling methods. Hands-on programming practice with R will be given in class. Students should bring their own laptops for the practical sessions.

\*\*\*\*\* A quiz will be given in the first week. If you fail to pass the quiz, you are suggested to take an introductory course of statistics first. \*\*\*\*\*\* 

\*\*\*\*\* Bring your laptop for the quiz. Make sure R is installed beforehand. \*\*\*\*\*

\*\*\*\*\* The meeting link for the first two weeks (Google Meet):  https://meet.google.com/jqx-avws-oag \*\*\*\*\*\*

methodologies.note: Statistical concepts along with real-life examples will be discussed.
Hands-on practice will be given in class.

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【ENC2053  Quantitative Methods and R Programming】 ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
